mapper.insert: insert into users (id, name, pwd, email, phone, post ,addr, detailaddr, findQuestion, findAnswer, regdate, lat, lng ) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{post} ,#{addr}, #{detailaddr}, #{findQuestion}, #{findAnswer}, SYSDATE, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.update: update users set pwd=#{pwd}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, post=#{post}, addr=#{addr}, detailaddr=#{detailaddr} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id from users where id=#{id}
